ruins.intro: Solo content (bi-weekly, 30 minutes). The goal is to maximize Bronze Ore gathering. If you just memorize vein capturing, guard clearing, unstable vein timing, palace response, and skill routine, you can reliably aim for the top ranks.

cheat.pri: Whales: Lv3 veins + guards + palace / F2P: 6× Lv1–2 vein routine

s0.title: Basic Info
s0.l1: Solo content, bi-weekly / 30 minutes, free time selectable
s0.l2: Goal: maximize Bronze Ore → core currency for Lord’s Gem growth
s0.l3: Ore Veins (Lv1–3): higher level = more ore / stronger guards → match power
s0.l4: Hand-drop Bronze Ore on capture: anyone can pick up → instant gain

s1.title: Basic Strategy
s1.l1: Strong players: focus on Lv3 veins → kill guards often to gain skill EXP
s1.l2: Weaker players: run a 6-vein Lv2 gathering routine (safe score)
s1.l3: Cesare Guards: defeating grants skill EXP, losing disables that hero for 5m
s1.tip: During the first 3 minutes, scout Lv2–3 vein + guard clusters, then relocate city for a favorable position.

s2.title: Palace Strategy
s2.l1: Strong players: prepare to enter central palace at 7 minutes left
s2.l2: With 3–4 × 50% march boosts, you’ll arrive with ~2s left (map/distance may vary)
s2.l3: Weaker players: avoid palace fights and focus on veins → stable points

s3.label: Skill Build
s3.title: Skill Tree & Timing
s3.lv1: Lv1 (R): Extra Bronze Ore when killing Guards
s3.lv3: Lv3 (L): Extra Bronze Ore when capturing (1m cooldown)
s3.key: Just hitting the 15-minute timing is enough to place 1st → avoid cooldown waste
s3.goal: Goal: reach Lv5 by 20 minutes left (gain EXP from killing Guards)

s4.title: Unstable Vein Timing
s4.l1: Fast gathering speed → always top priority target
s4.l2: Spawn times: at 20/19/18 minutes left and 10/9/8 minutes left
s4.l3: When alert appears, send all troops and instantly pick up hand-drops

s5.title: Key Tips
s5.l1: Optimize vein/guard/pickup loop: design circular route
s5.l2: Manage loss risk: weak heroes should avoid guards, focus on gather/pickup
s5.l3: Avoid overheated competition: move to nearby alternative veins
s5.warn: If defeated, that hero is unusable for 5 minutes → don’t risk your core team

s6.title: Summary
s6.sum1: Strong players: Lv3 veins + guards + 7-minute palace entry
s6.sum2: Weaker players: 6× Lv2 vein routine + guard focus
s6.sum4: Kill Cesare Guards → fast Lv5 skill progression
s6.sum5: Just memorizing R-R-L-L-R is enough for top ranks
